text: - My name is Leonhard.
I am CIO of the KÃ¤rcher Group in Germany.
We are a manufacturer of cleaning products
in Germany and Europe.
We were limited in infrastructure,
so we couldn't grow as we needed to,
especially for our e-commerce system.

It started that we tried out
AWS as a cloud provider for us.

We started growing more and
more into the public cloud
and in AWS services.

In 2017, we established
our first IoT solution
for our consumer products,
which was a serverless platform on AWS IoT
with Kinesis Data Streams and so on.

When we introduced and
innovated our new robot,

the Kira B50, there was
a lot of mindset change

in the company, because now
it's all about connectivity,
about sensors, about compute.

And so what we do is we
collect all the data in AWS,

we bring it together in our
serverless IoT platform,

and with that, we provide
new business models
and new possibilities for our customers.

We do VMware updates, but
also we do remote service

to the customers, predictive
maintenance and so on,

in order to fulfill
their needs in advance.
If a customer buys more than one Kira,
we also can have some fleet possibilities,

where they can see which
robot is doing what.
This innovation would not be possible
without a strong cloud background.

Building on AWS provides
us a lot of innovation,
fast-paced on a global scale,

where we bring the best in
class customer experience
for our products and services.
(upbeat jingle)
